START_PAGE.START_HEADER: A place that helps you prepare to join CBRE

OUR_VALUES.LABEL_RESPECT_DESC: We act with consideration for others' ideas and share information openly to inspire trust and encourage collaboration
OUR_VALUES.LABEL_INTEGRITY_DESC: No one individual, no one deal, no one client, is bigger than our commitment to our company and what we stand for
OUR_VALUES.LABEL_SERVICE_DESC: We approach our clients' challenges with enthusiasm and diligence, building longterm relationships by connecting the right people, capital and opportunities
OUR_VALUES.LABEL_EXCELLENCE_DESC: We focus relentlessly on creating winning outcomes for our clients, employees and shareholders

OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC2: TUCKER, LYNCH & COLDWELL renamed after the 1906 earthquake in San Francisco
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC5: With acquisition of Richard Ellis, and Hillier Parker, CB Richard Ellis is formed
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC6: The businesses of CB Hillier Parker and Insignia Richard Ellis merged in the United Kingdom and with effect from 23 July 2003, the main trading company in the UK became 'CB Richard Ellis Ltd
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC7: CBRE launches initial public offering on the New York Stock Exchange as 'CBRE'
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC8: Acquisition of Trammell Crow Company begins CBRE’s occupier outsourcing business
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC10: Acquisition of Norland Managed Services Ltd. Boosts EMEA occupier outsourcing business.
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC11: CBRE acquires GWS from Johnson Controls, renames CBRE occupier outsourcing services to 'GWS'
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC12: CBRE acquires FacilitySource, strengthening on-demand FM services
OUR_HISTORY.TIMELINE_DESC13: CBRE is ranked #146 on the Fortune 500

CBRE_TODAY.TITLE: CBRE Today
CBRE_TODAY.SUBTITLE: With broader and deeper capabilities than any other company, CBRE is the leading full-service real estate services and investment organization in the world.
CBRE_TODAY.DESC1: CBRE Group, Inc. is the world's largest commercial real estate services and investment firm, with 2015 revenues of $10.9 billion and more than 70,000 employees (excluding affiliate offices). CBRE has been included in the Fortune 500 since 2008, ranking #2
CBRE_TODAY.DESC2: Its shares trade on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol 'CBG.' The Company serves real estate owners, investors and occupiers worldwide. CBRE offers strategic advice and execution for property sales and leasing: corporate services; property, faci

ABOUT_GWS.TITLE: What is Global Workplace Solutions?
ABOUT_GWS.DESC1: Global Workplace Solutions (GWS) is redefining 'workplace because we believe every place of work can become a competitive advantage for our clients.
ABOUT_GWS.DESC2: Productivity, reliability, engagement, safety, brand - the workplace contributes to business results, whether it's an office, a retail outlet, a laboratory, a data center, a manufacturing environment or a virtual location
ABOUT_GWS.DESC3: GWS is a division of CBRE which supports occupier clients, helping them turn their real estate into real advantage.
ABOUT_GWS.DESC4: We support predominantly corporate clients who buy services on a contracted basis all across Europe, the Middle East and Africa - even globally, depending on their portfolio.
ABOUT_GWS.LABEL_ACCOUNT: on dedicated account teams serving more than

CORPORATE_RESP.TITLE: Corporate Responsibility
CORPORATE_RESP.SUBTITLE: We believe sustainable success can only be built on a foundation of responsible business practices.
CORPORATE_RESP.DESC1: As the world's largest real estate services company, we take the impact we have on our clients, suppliers, employees, communities and stakeholders seriously. It's our goal to be as widely recognized for the way we do business as we are for the quality of
CORPORATE_RESP.DESC2: CBRE continues to build on our foundation of responsible business pillars.

CAREERS.TITLE: Why work for GWS?
CAREERS.SECTION_HEADER: EVERY DAY YOU ARE EMPOWERED AND EXPECTED TO BE BETTER
CAREERS.SECTION_TITLE1: YOU HAVE THE FREEDOM TO MAKE YOUR OWN PATH
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM1_1: Your career is in your own hands; there's no need to wait to be shown the way
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM1_2: It's about how well you perform, not just how long you've worked here
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM1_3: You're encouraged to take intelligent risks and explore new ideas and innovations
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM1_4: Our scale gives you mobility and a broader choice of opportunities
CAREERS.SECTION_TITLE2: YOU ALWAYS HAVE A TEAM BEHIND YOU
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM2_1: An inclusive, sociable spirit exists across our company
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM2_2: We're proud of our work and know we can always improve
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM2_3: Our people inspire each other to aim for world-class
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM2_4: We enjoy tackling challenges together to achieve great outcomes
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM3_1: Learn more about working for GWS through this
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM3_3: which brings our workplace to life.
CAREERS.SECTION_APPLY: View all our vacancies and apply online
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM4_1: Please apply to any relevant roles listed directly on our website.
CAREERS.SECTION_ITEM4_2: Please note that speculative applications are only reviewed periodically, and agency CV's will be treated as a gift.

WHY_JOIN.TITLE: Why Join CBRE
WHY_JOIN.INTRO: EVERY DAY YOU ARE EMPOWERED AND EXPECTED TO BE BETTER
WHY_JOIN.SUBTITLE: Our Employee Advantage
WHY_JOIN.DESC1: Every day you are empowered and expected to be better. You have the freedom to make your own path. You always have a team behind you.
WHY_JOIN.DESC2: At CBRE, you are empowered to take your career where you want it to go. Enjoy workplace flexibility with tremendous scale - in an inclusive, collaborative environment with supportive teammates. You will be challenged to grow and be at your best every day.
WHY_JOIN.SECTION_HEADER: WHAT IT FEELS LIKE TO WORK AT CBRE

WHO_WE_SERVE.TITLE: Who We Serve
WHO_WE_SERVE.SUBTITLE: We support clients in every market sector.

PREPARE.TITLE: Preparing for Day 1
PREPARE.DESC: To ensure you are Day 1 ready, we have a few checklist items and upcoming check-ins.

CONTACT_US_PAGE.TITLE: Hello!!
CONTACT_US_PAGE.SUBTITLE: How can we help you?
CONTACT_US_PAGE.PLACEHOLDER: Describe how we can help, and a CBRE agent will contact you via email.

TRAINING.TITLE: Training
TRAINING.DESC: Initial training videos, and links to the full training library
